Plot Configurator¶

class evaluate.plotter_tool.plotter.plot_configurator.PlotConfigurator¶

Bases: object

plot_conf(x: str, y: list, style: list, color: list) → dict¶

Create a plot configuration.

Parameters:

  • x (str) – X-axis label.

  • y (list) – List of Y-axis labels.

  • style (list) – List of line styles for each Y-axis.

  • color (list) – List of colors for each Y-axis.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the plot configuration.

Return type:

dict
